description.message: The best clock to see in one glance the current date and time. With an option to see the digital clock in the browser toolbar.

ratedes.message: And let everyone know about this great extension!

areyouhappy.message: Are you happy about Date Today?

desrememberpage.message: If this option is enabled, it will not show you the reminder page

longdonatetext.message: I'd truly appreciate if you can donate me to keep this browser extension alive for other new users. Whether it's $$1 or $$100, your support is immensely appreciated!

enjoyshare.message: Enjoy this extension and share it with others who you think will appreciate it.

titelsyncbrowser.message: Sync the extension settings with your other browser

showremember.message: It doesn't show the reminder page when I open the options page

donatepromotext.message: If you can make a donation of any amount, I'd appreciate it immensely!

skipremember.message: Skip this, and open now the options page

des12h.message: If you turn this on, it show you the 12H clock format

textfoot.message: This software is licensed under the CC-GNU GPL. To view a copy of this license, visit

desstamp.message: Show the right click menu to stamp the current time and day

desnightmode.message: Enable the Night Mode clock style between the following time:

desbadge.message: Show the current time below the Date Today extension icon

welcomebasictext.message: Welcome on the Date Today Browser extension. Here a brief video about how to use the Date Today extension in your web browser.

promotext.message: Want to use something new and amazing for your web browser? Try the $product$ Browser extension.

donatetext.message: Due to the very small number of donations the project may be closed. Please support further development with a Donation.

sharetexta.message: Get this Cool Date Today browser extension

sharetextb.message: Hey, this is amazing! I tried the Date Today browser extension just today.

sharetextc.message: The Best and Amazing Date Today browser extension

sharetextd.message: Date Today' browser extension is the Best Tool for to see the current time and date. Download it now and try it yourself!

desclocktickpoint.message: Show the 4 dots for the hours

titelshowanalogclock.message: Show the analog clock inside the browser toolbar

titlebadgeweek.message: Show the day name of the week

titlebadgemonth.message: Show the day number and month

titlecopydone.message: Current date has been copied in the clipboard

desintroduce.message: All the features you're used to, with a brand new look and feel, and personalized to you.

desremrate.message: If you like Date Today™, please do not hesitate to rate this extension to five stars now. This gives us courage to continue to maintain and improve this product for you. Writing a review is recommended, but not mandatory. If you do not have the time to write a review, you can rate it anonymously. It is important to give it ★★★★★. Thank you!

wpermissionnotremoved.message: The permissions have already been removed

permissionoption.message: Permission must be enabled to use this feature.

desyoutube.message: Discover and learn more about Stefan's browser extension. Watch it now on YouTube.

desratebad.message: Sorry you have had this bad experience. Please let us know on how we can improve our extension for you.

desrategood.message: Happy to hear that you love Date Today! Will you take a moment to rate us in the browser extension store? Your browser extension store reviews make a difference!

desratetitle.message: Do you love this browser extension?

desratebadtitle.message: How can we make it better?

destapstar.message: Tap a star to rate it on the browser extension store.

permissionactivetab.message: This will only paste the timestamp to the currently open tab page.

permissioncontextmenu.message: This to add all the Date Today timestamp in the web browser context menu.

permissionstorage.message: This is to save the settings on your local computer, and to sync it to your web browser account.

permissionscripting.message: This is to inject JavaScript and CSS code into websites.

despip.message: Show the Date Today panel as a Picture-in-Picture window

permissionalarm.message: This is to get the current date and time at each refresh interval.
